description: The act of providing an object under an agreement that it will be returned at a later date. Reciprocal of BorrowAction.  Related actions:   BorrowAction: Reciprocal of LendAction.

borrower.description: A sub property of participant. The person that borrows the object being lent.

toLocation.description: A sub property of location. The final location of the object or the agent after the action.

fromLocation.description: A sub property of location. The original location of the object or the agent before the action.
